EmailTemplate.name: 18-BG TO-CloudBand-Email-OpenStack May2018-T0022O.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Visit us at OpenStack Summit Vancouver
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> OpenStack Summit Vancouver – 21-24 May, 2018 Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Here at Nokia CloudBand we’re all set for next week with a fantastic lineup of sessions as well as an exciting booth where we plan on showing you guys the latest and greatest from our work with OpenStack.
So, hold on to your laptops and click the session links below to add them to your OpenStack summit calendar:
Here are the links to all the CloudBand sessions:
- Closing the Loop: VNF end-to-end Failure Detection and Auto Healing <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/vancouver-2018/summit-schedule/events/20839/closing-the-loop-vnf-end-to-end-failure-detection-and-auto-healing?did=d000000000et&utm_campaign=cloudband&utm_source=email-list-marketoopenstackcontacts&utm_medium=email]]> - Cloud Monitoring with Vitrage – Hands-On Lab <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/vancouver-2018/summit-schedule/events/20957/cloud-monitoring-with-vitrage-hands-on-lab?did=d000000000et&utm_campaign=cloudband&utm_source=email-list-marketoopenstackcontacts&utm_medium=email]]> - On the Way to Cloud Native: Working with Containers in a Hybrid Environment <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/vancouver-2018/summit-schedule/events/20918/on-the-way-to-cloud-native-working-with-containers-in-a-hybrid-environment?did=d000000000et&utm_campaign=cloudband&utm_source=email-list-marketoopenstackcontacts&utm_medium=email]]>
- Proactive Root Cause Analysis with Vitrage, Kubernetes, Zabbix and Prometheus <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/vancouver-2018/summit-schedule/events/20964/proactive-root-cause-analysis-with-vitrage-kubernetes-zabbix-and-prometheus?did=d000000000et&utm_campaign=cloudband&utm_source=email-list-marketoopenstackcontacts&utm_medium=email]]> - Vitrage - Project Update <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/vancouver-2018/summit-schedule/events/21593/vitrage-project-update?did=d000000000et&utm_campaign=cloudband&utm_source=email-list-marketoopenstackcontacts&utm_medium=email]]> - Vitrage - Project Onboarding <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/vancouver-2018/summit-schedule/events/21653/vitrage-project-onboarding?did=d000000000et&utm_campaign=cloudband&utm_source=email-list-marketoopenstackcontacts&utm_medium=email]]> - Advanced RCA use cases - taking Vitrage to the next level <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/vancouver-2018/summit-schedule/events/21727/advanced-rca-use-cases-taking-vitrage-to-the-next-level?did=d000000000et&utm_campaign=cloudband&utm_source=email-list-marketoopenstackcontacts&utm_medium=email]]> - Vitrage RCA over K8s. Pets and Cattle - Monitor each cow? <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/vancouver-2018/summit-schedule/events/21729/vitrage-rca-over-k8s-pets-and-cattle-monitor-each-cow?did=d000000000et&utm_campaign=cloudband&utm_source=email-list-marketoopenstackcontacts&utm_medium=email]]> - Utilizing Standalone Cinder in Hybrid OpenStack/non-OpenStack Environments <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/vancouver-2018/summit-schedule/events/20900/utilizing-standalone-cinder-in-hybrid-openstacknon-openstack-environments?did=d000000000et&utm_campaign=cloudband&utm_source=email-list-marketoopenstackcontacts&utm_medium=email]]>
And don’t forget to drop by our booth (Nokia B6), for some hands-on, in-depth (but fun!) explanations on how this all works, step by step.
See you next week! The Nokia CloudBand Team Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
